overview: When a pint-sized 8-year-old kid witnesses a murder he offers to help the police, if they make him a cop, too. Saddled with this streetwise sidekick, a hardboiled cop is forced to take his new partner seriously as they race the clock to bring the bad guys to justice.
tagline: One kid's fantasy. One cop's nightmare.
cast: Burt Reynolds|Norman D. Golden II|Ruby Dee|Holland Taylor|Ray Sharkey
